name: Weed Farm Firm with Ganja Maps
name_original: Weed Farm Firm with Ganja Maps
description:
You need to learn how to begin a business.
It's very simple and basic game play.
Correct allocate your fund and make money.
Plant, grow, and deal your product.
Just tap your base and earn more income.
Level up and reach a higher target.
Protect your realm from gangster!
